mapper.select: select USER_SEQ from USERS where USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
select count(SULGO_FLAG) as SULGO_COUNT from SULGO where SULGO_DATE = to_char(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD') group by SULGO_FLAG having SULGO_FLAG = 1
select count(SULGO_FLAG) as NOPE_COUNT from SULGO where SULGO_DATE = to_char(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD') group by SULGO_FLAG having SULGO_FLAG = 2
select count(COLD_HOT_FLAG) as HOT_COUNT from COLD_HOT where COLD_HOT_DATE = to_char(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD') group by COLD_HOT_FLAG having COLD_HOT_FLAG = 1
select count(COLD_HOT_FLAG) as COLD_COUNT from COLD_HOT where COLD_HOT_DATE = to_char(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD') group by COLD_HOT_FLAG having COLD_HOT_FLAG = 2
